DOC.detailed_description: This 16-week , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo-controlled study compare adjunctive vortioxetine identically appear adjunctive placebo pill 88 stable patient research diagnosis schizophrenia determine Structured Clinical Interview DSM ( SCID ) . Patient randomization stratify illness duration ( i.e. , < /=5 year > 5 year ) order allow post-hoc analysis examine whether early illness moderate great negative /or cognitive symptom reduction response vortioxetine . Patients clinical stability least 3 month stable antipsychotic psychotropic medication treatment least last 4 week without relevant depression , positive psychotic symptom extrapyramidal symptoms EPS eligible . After write informed consent , patient undergo screen visit confirm full study eligibility . If in- exclusion criterion fulfil , patient undergo baseline assessment randomize 1:1 16 week adjunctive treatment vortioxetine placebo . Subsequently , patient see week 1 , 2 , 4 monthly next 3 month .
